photogen:
The camera can be used to take pictures of objects ingame. Holding it in hand automatically turns it on. use primary key (default: right click) to take a picture, first 10 pictures takes will be recorded in the journal and will give money and xp reward. 
Keep in mind that photos taken aren't synced with other players!
photoT1:
An old polteroid camera with high interference during ghost activity.
-> high time between photos
photoT2:
-> unlocked at level 25 
A digital camera that can take photos way fatser.
-> medium time between photos, display screen, medium paranormal interference, electronic
photoT3:
-> unlocked at level 70 
Top-of-the-rnge camera that takes photos super fast and has less interference during ghost activity. 
-> low time between photos, display screen, medium paranormal interference, electronic
